24 January, Wednesday
  • Clock newsMinistry of Defence: Il-76 was defeated from the ZKZ, located in the village of Lipcz Kharkov province

    Cases

    News
    14:55In Sahalina, we started using snowballers to deliver patients to hospitals.

    In the Sahel region, heavy equipment was required to be used for the delivery of births to the perinatal centre due to heavy metelic.

    14:09The authorities reported the deaths of all persons on board Il-76

    Anyone who was on board the fall in the Korochan region of the Beločan region of the Il-76 military transport aircraft was killed and reported to the head of the region, Viacheslav Gladkov.

    13:12A hotel was buried in Habarovska

    In Habarowske, there was a fire in the hotel building, reported to the MHS General Directorate on the edge.

    12:28The Il-76 plane with Ukrainian prisoners of war crashed in the Belgorod region

    On Wednesday, an IL-76 aircraft crashed in the Belgorod region, a Ukrainian military prisoner was on board and the Ministry of Defence of Russia reported.

    04:41Furniture factory in Chelabin province

    A major fire occurred at a furniture factory in Chelabin province

    04:18A 60-ton gas truck exploded in Mongolia

    A truck carrying 60 tons of petrol exploded in the Mongolian capital, Ulaanbaatar.

    21:11SC was interested in a mass fight before the fire at the Shusharakh warehouse.

    The head of the Investigation Committee, Alexander Bastrekin, has commissioned a criminal investigation into a mass fight that migrants have organized near the Wildberries warehouse in Petersburg, have been reported to the Department ' s press service.

    17:20Three people were injured in an explosion at a military factory in Azerbaijan

    The explosion took place at the Araz factory of Minoboronprom in the town of Shirwan, injured three persons and reported to the Prosecutor ' s Office of Azerbaijan.

    14:59A teenager stabbed a neighbor in a staircase in Moscow.

    In a residential house in the capital, a teenager stabbed a stairwell neighbour, opened a criminal case, and informed the Senior Assistant to the head of the SCU on the town of Yulia Ivanov.

    14:10Gvorkian KVN member died in Sochi after the fight.

    Amiran Gevorkian was killed in the Sochi festival after a fight with another man, a conflict was allegedly caused by an insult to his mother, and a familiar humorist was reported.

    13:21A woman who defended her dog from the wolf in Kurgan province died in the hospital

    In the Kurgan region, a woman died after a wolf attack: she wanted to protect her dog from the predator, reported to the CC Regional Investigation Department.

    12:42A pencil in Moscow died because of a Chinese blanket with heating.

    In the capital, a 69-year-old pensioner died because of a Chinese blanket with a heating, the device ignited when she was asleep, reporting to the media.

    12:05In the administrative building of the Catholic Church, a fire began in Moscow

    In the centre of the capital, a fire broke out in the Roman Catholic Church ' s ensemble building in the Milutinian alley, reported on Tuesday to the source in the operational services.

    11:42A half-half pornoactress dance in front of teenagers at the Novgorod Club caused a scandal.

    The Novgorod Oblast Prosecutor ' s Office has begun to verify information about the Russian porno-actress dance at the Great Novgorod Club, where teenagers are present, write the media.

    02:48Three people jumped out of windows during the Alma Ata earthquake

    Eight persons were injured in the Alma Ata earthquake, three of them affected by jumping out of the second and third floor windows and reporting to the city ' s health department.

    01:55There were details of the earthquake in China ' s Xinjiang.

    On Tuesday night, an earthquake of 7.1 was reported by the China Seismological Network Centre (CENC) in the Ushi district, located in the mountains in the north-west.

    01:22A man wearing a mask from a horror movie attacked a machete on the other one in Toronto.

    At least two people were injured as a result of an attack by a man with machetes dressed in a mask of horrors on a Canadian town of Toronto.

    22:37Owing to the weather in Petersburg, 15 fixed-wing aircraft left for spare airfields

    Owing to a strong side wind in Petersburg, 15 aircraft flying to Pulkovo airport left for spare airfields, and Rosaviation reports.

    17:48The pilot explained the large number of survivors of the Falcon 10B crash in Afghanistan.

    The Falcon 10B aircraft, however old, is considered to be a fairly secure vehicle, so it is the one who acquires it or rents businessmen for private travel, the FGLAD newspaper has declared a flight safety specialist, a former Aircraft Commander of Alexander Romanov, commenting on the crash of Falcon 10B aircraft in Afghanistan.

    15:14The Russian Ambassador to Afghanistan confirmed the death of two people in the Falcon 10 crash.

    Two of the six Falcon 10 aircraft on board had died, and the Russian Ambassador to Afghanistan, Dmitri Girnov, had informed the Russian Federation.

    Attack by Ukraine on Belgorod was directly involved in the West

    Ukraine has committed a new act of terror against civilians, and Belgorod has been subjected to massive bombardment of cluster munitions. Fifteen people were killed, including children. In Washington, D.C. stated that they were not encouraging such attacks, but the experts pointed out that it was the United States that was directly responsible. And not just them.

    Ukraine killed Ilyu Kivu for two reasons.

    In Podmoskovje, Ilya Kiwa was killed, one of Ukraine ' s most odious politicians who had travelled from “rights” to a political emigrant in Russia. In Kyiv, it has already been stated that the murder was committed within the framework of the " SBM " operation. What were the motives for the crime and what conclusions should Russia draw?

    NATO wants to use Hitler v. Kaliningrad

    The Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs cautioned NATO from participating in the recovery of chemical weapons from the Baltic Sea. Moscow considers such actions to be counterproductive and environmentally hazardous. Why did the issue of chemical weapons revert to the agenda and what dangerous poisoning substances had been on the bottom of the sea for decades?

    The West ignored Donetsk's massacre.

    On Tuesday, the U.S.U. launched a massive hit on Donetsk's center. According to official data, some 30 people were injured and six were killed. Against this background, Russia requested an urgent meeting of the UN Security Council. Is the international community in a position to recognize the truth about the crimes of Ukraine and why has such a strike been possible?

    Views
    Igor Maltese
    Paedophiles are the correct but insufficient measure

    A 11-year-old girl was raped. The criminal was held fast, they were a bastard who served six such crimes. I mean, he rapes a child, he gets laid, he's released, he rapes a child, he gets laid, and so he's infinite.

    38 comments
    Vladislav Isaev
    Diversion on the Crimean Bridge as an act of information war

    The narcotic of the sense of greatness that the Ukrainians have been feeding since Maydan has ceased to act, the organism is used. We have to increase doses. At all costs, even with damage to yourself.

    17 comments
    Public opinion
    The enemy is understandable, the terrorist never.

    Regardless of Russia ' s and Ukraine ' s relations, whatever the meaning of the impasse we would have entered together and separately, nothing and never acquitted what happened to Darya Dugin.

    15 comments
    Marina Ahmedova
    Tragedy in Permi revealed the problem of school psychologists.

    Many now read the final message of the killer, as true at last instance. He said he'd kill him anyway, that nothing would stop him, which means it is. No, it's not.

    172 comment
    Anton Lubić
    Tolerance to friends who get drunk for driving.

    In the case of Ephremov, calls for the head to be removed are still prevalent, but some of the members of the " douche " have already begun to tempt the Satan for false mercy.

    7 comments
    Elena Condrateva
    The civilian poet has mopped the people on the wheels.

    Somewhere in the parallel reality of deep alcoholism, a talented actor, Michael Efremov, hires a personal driver of a good man from Ryazani Sergei Zaharova. The Ephremov knows he's drunk, but the civil position with the morals has not been lost, so he only travels to his Grand Cherokee.

    71 Comments
    27 October 2023

    The authoritate of Careva in Ukraine is dangerous to Kiev

    In Crimea, an attempt was made against Oleg Tsareva, who, after 2014, had been extremely critical of the Ukrainian authorities and had dealt with the political agenda of Novorossia. The city whose opinion has always been painfully perceived in the Kiev offices has been hospitalized in a difficult state. Colleagues, friends and public figures agree that the King as no one else knew the subtle Ukrainian authorities and crossed their throats.

    Details...
    • 29 comments
    13 September 2023

    The dangerousness of the new tactics of the U.S. in the attack on Sevastopol

    The U.S.A. tried again to attack Crime and Sevastopol. This time, the adversary used a combined impact of 10 cruise missiles and three non-equipment boats. The Ministry of Defence reported that seven rockets had been intercepted and BEC had been dismantled. At the same time, two ships will be restored and returned to service, damaged by the enemy. What are the tactical features of another enemy attack and how should Russia respond to it?

    Details...
    • 58 comments
    12 September 2023

    "Work on the pod: Pilots saved the lives of 167 people

    Sochi's flight crew, Omsk, with a hydraulic malfunction, was able to put the car right on the field. As a result, none of the 167 people were injured on board. A similar case occurred four years ago in Podmoskovje, when the aircraft was placed on a corn plantation. What has allowed the pilots to repeat the Damir Yusupov stance and what is the emergency landing of the Sochi-Omsk flight different from the cornfield?

    Details...
    • 23 comments
    30 July 2023

    Ukraine has accumulated the experience of Al-Qaida in the attack on Moscow City

    The SSA again attempted an attack on Moscow. It is noted that the BPL raid has caused minor damage to the facades of the Moskva City Capital Business Centre, and the incident has resulted in casualties. What are the objectives of the adversary and how does Russia respond to his actions?

    Details...
    • 39 comments
    20 July

    Tankers in the Black Sea may pose a threat to the Crimean Bridge

    The RaHDit hacker group has published ship routes that could hit the Crimean Bridge. However, the shipowner of one of the vessels referred to in the investigation denied his involvement in the event. Could the drones really be launched from tank vessels? And what are the conclusions of what Russia should do to prevent such incidents in the future?

    Details...
    • 12 comments
    17 July 2023

    How Russia strengthen the protection of the Crimean Bridge

    The Crimean Bridge was attacked again by the U.S. Damage has not become critical for a strategically important infrastructure facility. However, experts indicate that there is a need to strengthen security at the site, from the sea. How can the bridge be strengthened and what will it take?

    Details...
    • 65 comments
    24 June 2023

    General Surovikin: The military rebellion will play against the enemy.

    " I call for a stop, the adversary is waiting for us to have a worse internal political environment. You can't play adversary. " General Sorovikin described the situation surrounding the Vagner CVC and its founder, Evgeny Prijin. What is the essence of this crisis and why is it a vested interest of the NSA and NATO?

    Details...
    • 118 comments
    30 May 2023

    Moscow has suppressed the psychological attack of Ukraine

    On Tuesday morning, Moscow attempted to attack Ukrainian drones. As a result of the attack, several dwellings were damaged and there were no serious injuries. According to the Ministry of Defence, out of eight vehicles, three were damaged by REB systems, and the remainder were hit by Panzir-S complexes. Kreml called the Kiev regime the organizer of the attack. What were the objectives of the enemy and how to prevent such incidents in the future?

    Details...
    • 30 comments
    6 May 2023

    Zahar Prilepin was injured for the Russian spring.

    On Saturday, in the Below City region, the vehicle of the writer Zahara Prileppin, who received fractures of his legs and a concussion of his brain, was damaged. His security guard died at the scene. The daughter of Prilepin, who left the car, was not hurt by happy accident. The first suspect's been arrested in hot spots. Who can stand behind this terrorist attack and why exactly was Prilepin chosen for attack?

    Details...
    • 16 comments
    3 March 2023

    How to close the border with Ukraine for divers.

    There is an increasing number of data in the Network on how Ukrainian diverstors penetrated the territory of the Bryan region. It is already known that they used natov weapons to attack. However, the fact that they have been able to enter the region raises the question: how can such seizures be prevented in the future?

    Details...
    • 43 comments
    2 March 2023

    The Bryan region attacked Basayevski.

    Several groups of Ukrainian fighters attacked the Bryan region. Their excerpt was described by the President of Russia as a terrorist attack. Terrorists have been presented by the " Ruse Volunteer Corps " , which works closely with VSO and local intelligence. What do we know about this organization and why does its actions look like terrorist attacks in the North Caucasus?

    Details...
    • 66 comments
    10 February 2023

    Delo Furgala has shown the rule of law and rights in Russia

    The court sentenced an ex-Governor of the Khabarov province, Sergey Furgal, accused of murder and attempted murder. On the basis of the jury verdict, he was sentenced to 22 years of colony. What is the precedent for regional elites for this judicial decision, and why is the ex-plainant who has committed serious crimes locked up only after years?

    Details...
    • 54 comments
    18 January 2023

    France, when selling helicopters, equals Ukraine to Africa.

    The Eurocopter H225 Super Puma helicopter, which died on Wednesday near Kiev, was not used in Europe because it was considered dangerous because of its structural shortcomings. But in 2018, Kiev purchased a shipment of such Eurocopters from France. Experts say that Paris would be afraid to sell H225 to another EU country. Why did these helicopters end up in Ukraine?

    Details...
    • 17 comments
    24 December 2022

    Why did the " business " end with tragedy

    More than 20 people were killed in the fire at the illegal " Business " shelter in Kemeroro. The survivors were taken to the local hospital. The landlord of the burnt house was pastor Andrei Smirnov. The place that some of his critics called the " cell " had been working for three years and had recently attempted to prevent the verification of PM. The preliminary cause of the fire has already been identified.

    Details...
    • 17 comments
    5 November 2022

    Why did the Café Poligon repeat the mistakes of the Zimney Beesh?

    As a result of the fire, 13 people were killed in the Polygon Costrom Café, 250 visitors were evacuated. The fire was probably caused by a shooting from a hunting rocket during a mass fight. The roof of the house is completely broken. Several evacuation exits were locked, triggering a pressure. In the spring of 2018, during the fire of the Colour TC, the winter cherries caused the rescue of people were also caused by closed exits.

    Details...
    • 82 comments
    23 October 2022

    The Sea Aircraft repeated in Irkutsk

    Su-30 fighters fell on the Irkutsk residence during the day-to-day flight, both crew members died, and only inadvertently lost civilian casualties. Less than a week ago, a similar aircraft crash took place in the Krasnodar Krai, where a bomber of Su-34 fell in Sheska. How can you explain a series of military aircraft crashes into homes?

    Details...
    • 40 comments
    Next page

    Circular 2005-2024 GS, Business Gazette Watch. Write to us.information@vz.ru

    Drafting policy

    The Russians are facing problems of navigation in the Red Sea.

    Shipping in the Red Sea is declining because of fear of hitting Husitas. Ship charter and insurance. What would happen if ships carrying Russian oil would also have to abandon the direct route in the Red Sea and bypass Africa through the Cape of the Good Hope? And why would Saudi Arabia not squeeze Russian oil in Asia?Details

    • China doubled the purchase of Russian aluminium and oil.
    • The Court found that it was not effective to transfer the Baltic brand to the Carlsberg structure.
    • The skies are cheap.
    Move to section

    The Hamma towards Trumpa will become the Green song

    " First think and then speak. " This was the response of the President of Ukraine, Vladimir Zelen Donaldu Trampe, to his proposals for a settlement of the conflict. Obviously Zelensky said that without thinking about his own fate.Details

    • Ukrainian troops fired 70 rounds per day at the Belarusian region
    • Medvedev described the Il-76 disaster as a result of the internal political struggle in Kiev
    Move to section

    How Russia will answer the U.S. attack in Donetsk

    The U.S.A. attacked the Donetsk market, killing 25 people. Russia called on the international community to condemn the attack and promised to raise the subject in the United Nations. In order to prevent attacks on Donetsk, it is necessary to move the enemy to the west. The Russian forces have taken a strong team site at the former base of the " Caesar Hunting " , as well as some data suggest that they have entered Avdeevka. Why is the consolidation in Avdeevka important to the security of Donetsk and what is the tactics of the Russian forces?Details

    • The fallen Il-76 took the plane away from the villages.
    • In Moscow, the mother decided to order the murder of her son because of her inheritance.
    • Local residents were not affected by the Il-76 crash in the Belgorod region
    Move to section

    Europeans are becoming the main force of opposition in the EU

    Alternates for Germany and the French faction of the Patriota allowed both countries to withdraw from the EU. These statements are made against the backdrop of a sharp increase in the approval of the European skepticalism and the continuing economic downturn of the alliance. Can Berlin and Paris really leave Europe? Does Russia need to preserve this organization in the future?Details

    • French farmers complained about cheap Ukrainian chicken
    • Kabmin Hungary encouraged the Parliament to ratify the Swedish membership in NATO
    • Opel decided to reintroduce the Frontera mark.
    Move to section

    Attack by Ukraine on Belgorod was directly involved in the West

    Ukraine has committed a new act of terror against civilians, and Belgorod has been subjected to massive bombardment of cluster munitions. Fifteen people were killed, including children. In Washington, D.C. stated that they were not encouraging such attacks, but the experts pointed out that it was the United States that was directly responsible. And not just them.Details

    • Politologist: Ukraine cannot recognize the tragic crimes of its forces.
    • In Sahalina, we started using snowballers to deliver patients to hospitals.
    • The authorities reported the deaths of all persons on board Il-76
    Move to section
    • Andrei Medvedev
      Leave the thugless men

      pray for the dead Russian pilots, Russian soldiers and forgive the enemies who have died today. They're not answering us anymore.

      5 comments
    • Vadim Truhačev
      Belgium is the best target for hard action. Russian Federation

      Belgium has actively pursued anti-Russian declarations and actions. It was she who proposed the removal of the 280 billion euros belonging to Russia. But that country was very vulnerable, and Russia could respond to many difficulties for the Belgians, whose burial would cause them themselves, and the European Union as a whole would ease the attention of Ukraine and us.

      5 comments
    • Irina Alxnis
      Where the fashion came from to Russia

      The main reason why the world started singing "my marmalade, I'm not right" and admiring Russian shops is that this very world has failed to break our country.

      6 comments
    • Chisinau has denunciated an agreement with the CIS on cooperation in the elimination of the CC
    • The Ukrainians override the new yearly treatment of the Zelena
    • New cases have been initiated in Moscow as a result of the attack on the slave traders.
    Move to section

    • When Germany comes out of the EU

      Alisa Weidel, Co-Chair of the Alternate for Germany, advocated a referendum in Germany to withdraw from the EU on the British model. This may happen if the Alternate comes to power, in which Videl personally has no doubt or even a time limit for possible victory.

    • Attempted by Zelena on Russian soil

      Vladimir Zelensky ' s decree on " Historically populated territories of the Russian Federation " in Sobezye, referred to as " a road caused by a failure on the front " . What's the point of this move? And how does it have to be perceived as a cheap pyre or as a serious threat?

    • NATO is preparing for the total war with the RF

      The Chairman of the NATO Military Committee, Rob Bauer, called on the civilian population of the Alliance to prepare for the “total war” with Russia for the next 20 years. At the same time, NATO mobilized a record number of troops for training. How seriously should such words and actions be taken?

      Move to section

      • Russia celebrated the Creation

      • The actor Yuri Solomon died.

      • Germany has received massive protests

        Move to section

        • Development of the Russian transport system in 2023

          Transport, one of the fundamental branches of the Russian economy, did not just survive in 2023 but showed growth. This applies to both internal routes and those linking Russia to the outside world. The key performance indicators for Russian transport are in our picture.

        • As the popularity of Russian payment systems is growing

          The withdrawal from the Russian market of the western services providing financial services has led to the blossom of domestic payment systems (Mir banquet maps, SBP fast payment systems, and the SPF financial communications system). The explosion of their popularity is in our picture.

        • Russia ' s largest growing industries

          The Russian industry has been growing rapidly, sometimes by tens of per cent annually. Which industries are the fastest growing in our infography.

          Move to section

          • Clickco started a match against Zelensky.

            Mayor Kiev and former World Boxing Champion for the Vitali professionals It was abruptly discovered that Ukraine was moving in the wrong direction. The Kyivist gradonalist strongly criticized the President of Ukraine, Zelensky, and stated that the country was " certified and authoritarian " . The experts link what is happening with the fall of the Zelena rating and the fact that the West has begun to find him a changer.

          • Trampu set up traps all over America.

            In the 16 states of the United States, lawsuits were filed to prevent former President Donald Trampa from participating in the Republican Party ' s primer. If these lawsuits were met, Trump would not be able to participate in the election of the head of State, but the political implications could be far more severe for all the United States.

          • Byden left Green without a Christmas present.

            The visit of the President of Ukraine to Washington, with a view to achieving the United States of America ' s next cash tranche, has ended in failure. Differences within Congress continue to prevent the adoption of a multi-million-dollar programme of assistance to Ukraine and it has already been stated that it will be " practically impossible " until Christmas.
